name: api-nexus-v2-conduit
description: Conduit - Self-Architecting API Platform & Inter-Plugin Communication Hub. Intent-to-API generation, self-optimizing runtime, API evolution AI, multi-protocol synthesis (REST, GraphQL, gRPC), and schema registry. Foundation for all plugin communication. Provides 12 specialized agents and 15 commands for 75-80% backend developer reduction.
features: Intent-to-API Generation (v2.0) - Natural language to full API implementation
Self-Optimizing Runtime (v2.0) - Auto-caching, N+1 elimination, query optimization
API Evolution AI (v2.0) - Safe versioning, migration paths, breaking change detection
Multi-Protocol Synthesis (v2.0) - REST, GraphQL, gRPC from single spec
Schema Registry (v2.0) - Centralized API contract management
API Gateway (v2.0) - Unified entry point with rate limiting, auth, routing
GraphQL Federation (v2.0) - Apollo Federation v2 for unified graph
Webhook Orchestration (v2.0) - Reliable webhook delivery with retry
Circuit Breaker (v2.0) - Fault tolerance with fallback strategies
